This is a handsome looking shirt, I bought several in the different colors and plaids they offer.  It fits great, the sleeves and the length are perfect for me.  Not too heavy so you can wear it from spring to winter.  I've gotten many complements when wearing them.  Also got them when they were on sale, so some were (the plaids) were priced at $15.99. Awesome price for the quality of the shirts.
Great fit…lots of compliments.

评论概述: This is a high quality shirt.
评论详情: I like this shirt. The material is not thin like lower quality shirts. The size fits as ordered. no loose buttons or hanging threads. I recommend it and will probably buy this brand again.
It looking good

I do like this shirt, but I don't love it. The fit is great. The length is perfect as I don't like shirts that look like a dress. Shorter than most other flannels but not as thick and heavy. Super soft and it will be a great shirt for spring and fall but I will stick with my heavy flannels for winter. The colors are awesome. Not too bright but not dull at all. I liked it enough to buy a second one, so I do highly recommend this flannel. Just expect something between a cotton shirt and a heavy flannel and you will be thrilled. Nothing bad to say but not what I expected for a flannel.
It's a nice shirt but it shrank a lot after the first wash
Great shirt; launders well!  Minimal shrinkage after first wash.
This flannel shirt is light weight and soo soft. I bought it for my husband because he had shoulder surgery, and he needed a button up shirt that would be easy to get on and off. We love it!
Couldn’t believe how much this shirt shrunk. Purchased Jan 21 and nowhere does it show I can return it?
Soft, warm, good fit
Very nice light flannel Great colors
Good quality shirt at a good price.  I liked the material.  Shirt style.  Great length.  I don't like long shirts.  Nice color.

After a few wash and dry's it shrunk in length but not width and is now perfect size, but thinner than all other flannel shirts I have bought (including amazon essential shirts) might buy again but definitely not a work shirt unless you work at a desk, physical work would probably destroy quick which is a shame as I only buy Lee extreme motion jeans to work in. But nice for mild weather.
